description:
Use this tool to quickly see the members of the local Administrators group on multiple remote computers.

Ever wanted to see who actually has local Administrator permissions on all of your workstations and servers? If so then this free tool is for you. Simply enter the names of the computers you want to scan (or import them from Active Directory or a text file), and the application will show you who is a member of the local Administrators group on each of them - optionally including members of nested groups within the Administrators group.

Features
- Easy to use, intuitive GUI
- Scan multiple remote computers (import computers from Active Directory, text file, or enter manually)
- Optionally include members from nested domain groups that are members of the Administrators group
- Export results to CSV file or HTML file
Added right click menu option to copy selected account names from results
When adding an individual computer, you can now add multiple computer names separated by a comma
When exporting to CSV or HTML you will now be prompted to open the file once the export has finished
Multiple computers can now be selected from the target computer list and can then be removed at the same time
CSV export now uses language specific separator character based on your OS settings
